definitions.definition: marijuana, or, more generally, any type of illegal drug:
examples: They were arrested for smoking/selling/buying dope.

definitions.definition: to give a person or an animal drugs in order to make them perform better or worse in a competition:
examples: They were arrested for doping racehorses.

definitions.definition: to give a person or an animal a drug to make them want to sleep:
examples: We always have to dope up our cat for long car journeys.
